articles.title: US Winter Storm Sets Off Power Grid Emergencies, Travel Chaos - Bloomberg
articles.description: A sprawling winter storm has grounded more than 14,500 flights around the US, triggered a grid emergency and knocked out power to thousands, all while threatening to drop a foot of snow on New York City and the rest of the Northeast corridor on Sunday.
